standup.title: What’s up with you?
standup.summary: Go around as a team and give personal updates instead of work updates.
standup.description: E.g. “yesterday my wife and I watched the worst movie and today our daughter is having her first ever swimming lesson”
benefits: Helps the team connect on a personal level
You may notice that the team still communicates fine without talking specifically about the status of what they’re working on
